tag_list: consultaurant, deal-barter, social-media, technology, tech, startup, founder, ceo, entrepreneur, leader, creator, strategist
overview:
Strategic, Innovative, Ambitious, Leader, and Character all sum up Elijah German.

Elijah has a passion for anything and everything tech. After working for some great companies including Restaurant.com, PIRQ, Dealster, and PennySaverUSA, Elijah is making his dreams reality.

Since the development of Facebook and Twitter, social media continues to influence business owners, primarily restaurant owners. Elijah saw the need and filled the void by created Consultaurant.

Consultaurant focuses on building and managing Facebook and Twitter pages for restaurants or any business food/drink related (i.e. Food Trucks, Lounges, Bars, etc.)

Elijah also is a the Founder of Deal Barter, a social online and mobile platform that makes community trading/bartering simple. He continues to educate and inspire future and current leaders to be at their best.
